name: Escape The Abyss
description:
Ludum Dare 31 Entry - Escape The Abyss

Top-down 2D platformer

Controls:

Left-click to move

Right-click to jump

M toggles music on/off

Story:

The last thing you remember is falling asleep.

The voices told you that you weren't safe

anymore, but you didn't believe them... THEY

LIED ABOUT DAVID! They lied about a lot

things. I must find him... even if I lose myself

in doing so.
